Thit k website bn hng{' '}
chuyn nghip

Tng doanh thu bn hng online vi trang web bn hng
c lp chun SEO, bt mt

Lin h s dng

4 li ch khng th ph nhn{' '}
vi ch shop & doanh nghip

Tip cn 61% ngi mua{' '}
hng trn website

Mc d xu hng mua hng trn sn TMT, mng x hi ngy cng cao, nht l Facebook, Shopee v Lazada, nhng khch hng vn tin tng la chn website l ni mua sm uy tn

Tng hiu qu hot ng{' '}
qung co

Nh tnh n nh v bo mt, mi hot ng qung co trc tuyn u ly website lm trung tm. Thit k website chuyn nghip s lm tng hiu qu SEO v chuyn i qung co

Xy dng c uy tn v{' '}
thng hiu

To website bn hng vi giao din chuyn nghip v p mt, h tr mua sm online tin li s khin cho khch hng yu qu, tin tng hn vo sn phm v thng hiu ca bn

H tr Chm sc khch hng{' '}
24/7

Khch hng c th xem v t hng bt c lc no trong ngy, v bn c th t vn cho khch hng 24/7 ngay trn website. T , doanh thu ca bn s tng ln nhanh chng

HT Web gip bn thit k website chuyn nghip

Khng cn bit thit k hay lp trnh bn vn c th to{' '}
website bn hng vi nhiu tin ch hin i

400+ giao din Responsive p mt

Giao din web ca HT Web c u t thit k t m v a dng, sn sng p ng nhu cu lm trang web bn hng cho hn 30 ngnh ngh khc nhau. c bit, tt c giao din ny u c ng dng cng ngh Responsive nn c th hin th ti u trn mi thit b. D cho khch hng ca bn online bng thit b g, my tnh, my tnh bng hay in thoi di ng th website u hin th p mt

Bo mt tuyt i website vi chng ch SSL{' '}

Tch hp bo co Google Analytics trn qun tr website{' '}

Lin h s dng

Lm sao c n hng trm n hng{' '}
mi ngy t website?

HT Web gip ti u hiu{' '}
qu SEO v qung co

H tr ti u cho SEO

Vi dch v thit k web chuyn nghip ca HT Web, khng cn phi l mt chuyn gia SEO bn vn c th a website ca mnh ln top 1 Google. HT Web gip bn thit k web chun SEO vi cu trc website c ti u thn thin vi cng c tm kimwebsite c ti u thn thin vi cng c tm kim. Ngoi ra, bn c th ty chnh th tiu (Title), m t (Meta Description) v URL trong website, thm th alt ca hnh nh

Tng hiu qu qung co

Bn cnh vic h tr qung b web t nhin thng qua SEO, to web bn hng vi HT Web cn mang n cho bn mt trang ch tuyt vi nhm pht huy tt nht hiu qu qung co tr ph nh Google Adwords hay Facebook Ads. Phng php ny gip website ngay lp tc tip cn n khch hng tim nng, ng thi h tr cc chin dch qung b t nhin hiu qu hn

H tr qung co mua sm Google Shopping

Qung co Google Shopping ang ngy cng khng nh v th vi t l click vo qung co cao hn 35% hnh thc qung co thng thng. Vi HT web, bn c th ng b sn phm trn website vi Google Merchant Center mt cch nhanh chng, ng thi xem ton b bo co ngay trn trang qun tr HT Web m khng cn ng nhp vo h thng bo co phc tp ca Google

Vi cng ngh vt tri v tnh nng khc bit

Thit k website bn hng HT Web{' '}
gip bn hng 24/7

Tch hp phn mm chatlive

Mi thc mc ca khch hng s c tr li nhanh chng, khng nhng gip bn ghi im trong mt khch hng m cn tng kh nng cht n hng. To website bn hng HT Web c tch hp sn sng vi cc phn mm live chat hng u nh Zopim, Subiz..., gip ch ca hng chat vi khch hng ngay trn website bt c khi no

Quy trnh t hng t ng

Khch hng ca bn c th tin hnh t hng trn web bt c khi no. Bi vy, lp trang web bn hng vi quy trnh t hng hon ton t ng s gip h s hu mn a thch ch sau mt vi thao tc n gin m khng cn phi tn thi gian gi in hay nhn tin cho ch shop

Tng t l hon thnh n hng vi Abandoned Checkout

Vi tnh nng Abandoned Checkout, HT Web s gip bn thu thp thng tin khch hng ngay c khi h cha hon tt n hng. T nhng thng tin ny bn c th gi email marketing, coupons khuyn mi ... "thc gic" khch hng hon tt n t hng

Lin h s dng

Bn ang kinh doanh lnh vc no?

HT Web mang n gii php dnh ring cho bn
{ stores.map((value,index) => { return(

); }; export async function getStaticProps() { // Run API calls in parallel const [stores, homepage, themes] = await Promise.all([ fetchAPI("/stores?type_store=solution"), fetchAPI("/homepage"), fetchAPI("/stores?_publicationState=preview&published_at_null=true&slug=giao-dien-moi-trang-chu"), ]); return { props: { stores , homepage, themes: themes[0] }, revalidate: 1, }; } export default Home;
